title: India and Russia eye dynamic rupee-rouble rate, vostro balance to bypass dollar rrade barriers
description: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) recently took feedback from banks and financial institutions dealing with Russian funds registered in India. Some Russian financial institutions earlier sounded out RBI on a mechanism to let them use rupees lying in special accounts in India, for investment in stocks and securities here.
